title: Aggregated U.S. Median Household Income by City-State-Year
description: City-level aggregation of U.S. median household income derived from the U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) 1-Year Subject Tables (S1901). Each record represents the estimated median household income for a city and year.

sources.name: U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey 1-Year Estimates

columns.Median_Income: Estimated median household income in USD

preservation.format_durability: CSV and JSON formats ensure long-term readability
